Player History
Had first career hit on 4/12/1985, off Teddy Higuera (CIN)...
Earned first career win on 4/17/1985...
6/24/1987: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $5,410,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1987, going 2-0, 1.05...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Hit first career homerun on 6/17/1988, off Ramon Martinez (ATL)...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
4/3/1990: Signed a contract extension with St. Louis, $5,410,000 per year, for 4 years.
Traded from St. Louis to Atlanta on 4/18/1990 (Going to STL: P Woody Williams, P Scott Ruskin, 2B Delino Deshields. Going to ATL: P Danny Cox)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1990, going 6-0, 1.47...
